contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Would you like to get in touch with me? I look forward to your message!

confirmation.headline: Thank you
confirmation.message: Your message has been successfully sent. I will get back to you as soon as possible.

not-found.title: Oops, nothing here
not-found.description: The page you are looking for was moved, removed, renamed or might never existed.

server-error.title: Server Error
server-error.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
